lines.content: //The main loop where all the input cases are run through, if there was no specific command given, the statement is added as a task to the list.
String instruction = userInput.contains(" ") ? userInput.substring(0, userInput.indexOf(" ")): userInput;
case "bye": // When the command bye is given, the program exits the while loop and stops
case "list": // Lists out all the current tasks in the order that they were added in
case "done": // Has to be input with an integer value indicating the specific task to be marked as completed
System.out.println("YAY! That task has been marked as complete");
case "todo": // Adds a task to the list that is marked as to be done.
System.out.println("Nice! The task has been added to your todo list");
case "deadline": // Adds a task to the list that has a deadline that it needs to be completed by, using "/by" as the input command
System.out.println("Nice! The task has been added to your deadlines");
case "event": // Adds a task to the list that will occur in the future by a given date, using "/at" as the input command.
System.out.println("Nice! The task has been added to your events list");
default: // When no specific command is selected, the input is added automatically to the list of tasks.
System.out.println("Oh no! Please select a valid task from the list");
public void printEmptyDescription() { System.out.println("OOPS! The description cannot be empty"); }
public void printMissingDeadline() { System.out.println("There seems to be a problem! Please specify a deadline for the task using /by"); }
public void printMissingEvent() { System.out.println("I see an issue here! Please specify a timing for the Event using /at"); }
public void printIntructionsUnclear() { System.out.println("Instructions Unclear! Type \"help\" for a list of available commands."); }
System.out.println("Hello, here are all the commands available");
System.out.println("1. \"List\" to view all tasks in the todo list");
System.out.println("2. \"todo\" to add a task to the todo list");
System.out.println("3. \"deadline\", task details, \"/by\" time, in order to add a task to the list with a deadline");
System.out.println("4. \"event\", task details, \"/at\" time, in order to add an event to the list along with the time it occurs.");
String instruction = userInput.contains(" ") ? userInput.substring(0, userInput.indexOf(" ")): userInput;
System.out.println("OK! That task has been marked as complete");
System.out.println("The task has been added to your todo list");
System.out.println("The task has been added to your deadlines");
System.out.println("The task has been added to your events list");
System.out.println("Please select a valid task from the list");
